text: Clifford Olson (January 1, 1940 â€“ September 30, 2011) was a Canadian serial killer. He killed at least 11 kids and teenagers in British Columbia, in the late 1970s. He was convicted of the crime, and from to he 1980s, he spent his life in prison. In the 1990s and 2000s, requests for parole were denied. Olson died of cancer in 2011. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Canadian murderers Category:Canadian prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:Cancer deaths in Quebec Category:People convicted of murder Category:People from Vancouver Category:People with antisocial personality disorder Category:Serial killers
title: Clifford Olson
